commentBody: its time for coughlin to go but even more so for reese to go.  the culture needs to change, there needs to be more fight, more accountability.  but the players need to change to.  they need a significant upgrade almost across the board; dl, lb, cb, safety, wr, te, rb.  they have several good players; eli, 4/5ths of the ol, hankins, odb, drc but that's about it.  kennard and prince are injured to much. jpp is not the player he once was,  maybe collins but too soon to tell.  it was difficult for coughlin to get much out of this group but to many lapses by him.  it will be bad if coughlin goes but reese stays because i see reese as more to blame than coughlin.  mara needs to have some intestinal fortitude and make the right decision finally.  he is a couple years to late.
